header.title: Advanced BBCode Box 3 (aka ABBC3) - Update from 3.0.8-PL1 to 3.0.11
header.description: This file provides instructions for upgrading ABBC3 MOD from version 3.0.8-PL1 to version 3.0.11
header.author-notes:
IMPORTANT: This update includes many new icons and graphics inside the styles/abbcode folder.
Make sure you upload every file listed in the File copy section. Any directory with *.* means ALL the contents of that directory (and all content in directories nested within) must be copied to your server.
Also, be sure to delete the old files listed in the Delete files section from your server. Any directory with *.* means you should delete that entire directory from your server.
If you have any doubt - there is no harm in simply uploading every file included in this MOD's root folder to the appropriate locations on your server.
